objectives: Students will discuss education and learning using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Business/Corporate themed scenarios related to education and learning
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining education and learning content with Business/Corporate narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore education and learning through a Business/Corporate lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a corporate or business challenge involving education and learning

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to education and learning in a business context
Students engage in business themed role-play about education and learning using slang register
Students create original business themed content about education and learning in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe education and learning in a Business/Corporate scenario?
What strategy or negotiation might be involved in education and learning?
Can you create a Business/Corporate story about education and learning?
How does education and learning change when viewed through a Business/Corporate perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this business scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Business/Corporate situation involving education and learning
roles: Character A: Using slang register in business context
Character B: Responding in slang register within business theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Business/Corporate theme: Professional scenarios, workplace situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Business/Corporate themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
